# Plyr package

`is_quoted`
-----------

A utility function for checking whether arguments to the \*\*ply family
have been wrapped with `.(...)`. 

`quick_df`
----------

A quick and dirty way to turn a list, data.frame, or environment into
a data.frame (with no row names).

`summarize`
-----------

A function to be used in conjunction with the `.fun` argument in `ddply`
calls that evaluates the given expressions within the passed data.frame
by splits (with enclosing environment the parent calling environment).
Useful for summarizing data sets with tapply-like aggregation.
